definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: True happiness is of a retired nature, and enemy to pomp and noise.
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福不顯山露水，它擯棄浮華和喧囂。

sentences.english: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
sentences.chinese: 簡化，就是消除不必要的，必要的才顯山露水。

sentences.english: It has come to the surface over the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 他在過去幾年中終於開始顯山露水。

sentences.english: Until he fully when he captured your mediocrity would be.
sentences.chinese: 等他完全俘虜你的心時，他的平庸就顯山露水了。

sentences.english: True happiness is of a retired nature, and an enemy to pomp and noises;
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福不顯山露水，它摒棄浮華和喧囂。
